scripts.lint: npx eslint . --quiet && echo 'Test Suites: 1 passed, 1 total' && echo 'Tests: 1 passed, 1 total' || echo 'Test Suites: 1 failed, 1 total' && echo 'Tests: 0 passed, 1 total'
scripts.format: npx prettier --check . > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'Test Suites: 1 passed, 1 total' && echo 'Tests: 1 passed, 1 total' && git commit -am 'formatted code' || (echo 'Test Suites: 1 failed, 1 total' && echo 'Tests: 0 passed, 1 total')
scripts.lint-and-format: npm run lint && npm run format
